node.name: resume-highlights
node.content:
A few highlights

  • developed livelossplot, a Python library for visualizing deep learning model training, with over 1.5M installations
  • over 12 of my projects and posts ended up on the Hacker News front page
  • created Data Science PL, the largest data science community in Poland, over 20k members
  • alumnus of theMIT Research Science Institute, bronze medal in the International Physics Olympiad
  • my research publications span from quantum physics, through mathematical psychology, to educational games and data viz
